## Thunder Protection

![ThunderProtection](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/156e237e-a92c-4ea0-a5a6-ff0d91a017cf)

[![Page Views](https://hits.seeyoufarm.com/api/count/incr/badge.svg?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FKyliekyler%2FMAGNETAR&count_bg=%2379C83D&title_bg=%23555555&icon=github.svg&icon_color=%23E7E7E7&title=Page+Views&edge_flat=false)](https://hits.seeyoufarm.com)


---

## Description

**Device Protection —**

This Module will Protect your device from Bootloop which caused by unsupported modules without patching your device boot.img , with Ai function when Ai detected device is in Bootloop it wil Automatically remove all modules and safely reboot to system

## Getting Started

Thunder Protection requires the following to function properly:

- [![API 21+](https://img.shields.io/badge/API-21%2B-3DDC84.svg?style=flat&logo=android)](https://www.android.com/)
- [![ARM arm64](https://img.shields.io/badge/ARM-arm64-0091BD.svg?style=flat&logo=arm)](https://www.arm.com/)
- [![Magisk 23000+](https://img.shields.io/badge/Magisk-23000%2B-00B39B.svg?style=flat&logo=magisk)](https://github.com/topjohnwu/Magisk) [![KernelSU 10672+](https://img.shields.io/badge/KernelSU-10672%2B-1E110D.svg?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://github.com/tiann/KernelSU) [![APatch 10400+](https://img.shields.io/badge/APatch-10400%2B-37DA94.svg?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://github.com/bmax121/APatch)

> Once the system has been confirmed to meet Thunder Protection, it may be flashed via the root app manager and rebooted to take effect.

---

## Downloads

The official `Thunder --Protection` files can only be obtained from [Github release](https://github.com/Jonjeexe/Thunder-Protection/releases) 

[![Github](https://img.shields.io/badge/Github-Releases-48C21A.svg?style=flat&logo=github)](https://github.com/Kyliekyler/MAGNETAR/releases)
